mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_IDX, USER_IDX, SUBJECT, HIT_CNT, REG_DATE FROM QNA_BOARD
SELECT T1.BOARD_IDX, T1.USER_IDX, T2.USER_ID, T1.SUBJECT, T1.CONTENT, T1.HIT_CNT, T1.REG_DATE FROM QNA_BOARD T1 JOIN USERS T2 WHERE T1.USER_IDX = T2.USER_IDX AND T1.BOARD_IDX = ${value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_BOARD (USER_IDX, SUBJECT, CONTENT) VALUES (#{user_idx},#{subject},#{content})
